[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@cerbos/lite](./lite.md)

## lite package

Client library for interacting with WebAssembly Cerbos policy bundles from server-side Node.js and browser-based applications.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Lite](./lite.lite.md) | A client for interacting with a WebAssembly Cerbos policy bundle. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Options](./lite.options.md) | Options for creating a new [Lite](./lite.lite.md) client. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DecodedJWTPayload](./lite.decodedjwtpayload.md) | The decoded payload of a JWT, containing the claims. |
|  [DecodeJWTPayload](./lite.decodejwtpayload.md) | A function to verify and decode a JWT, returning its payload. |
|  [Source](./lite.source.md) | WebAssembly binary code of a policy bundle (or an HTTP response from which to stream it). |
